titleStmt.title: A copye of a verye fyne and vvytty letter sent from the ryght reuerende Levves Lippomanns byshop of Verona in Italy, and late legate in Polone, from the moste holy and blessed father Pope Paule the fourth, and from his most holy sea of Rome. Translated out of the Italyan language by Michael Throckmerton
titleStmt.author: Lippomano, Luigi, 1500-1559.

titleStmt.title: A copye of a verye fyne and vvytty letter sent from the ryght reuerende Levves Lippomanns byshop of Verona in Italy, and late legate in Polone, from the moste holy and blessed father Pope Paule the fourth, and from his most holy sea of Rome. Translated out of the Italyan language by Michael Throckmerton
titleStmt.author: Lippomano, Luigi, 1500-1559.
Throckmorton, Michael. aut

notesStmt.note: Actual place of publication and printer's name from STC.
Written to "Peter Conterinia, gentylman of venece, at Rome".--Folger Shakespeare Library Catalog.
Considerable print show-through; leaves tightly bound.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
